summary: Replaced non-functional <C-\> terminal mode mapping with <C-'> for STT toggle in Claude Code sidebar. Removed redundant mapping from claudecode.lua and consolidated to stt/init.lua. Normal mode <C-\> preserved.

artifacts.summary: Updated terminal mode STT toggle from <C-\> to <C-'>
Removed redundant buffer-local terminal mode STT keymap
Implementation summary with verification results and key binding table

completion_data.completion_summary: Replaced <C-\> with <C-'> for terminal mode STT toggle, consolidated mapping to stt/init.lua, removed duplicate from claudecode.lua.
